item.title: Enabling Cortana for dbareports PowerBi
item.description:
Last week at the Birmingham user group I gave a presentation about PowerShell and SQL Server

It was a very packed session as I crammed in the new sqlserver module, dbatools and dbareports ðŸ™‚ On reflection I think this is a bit too much for a one hour session but at the end of the session I demoâ€™d live Cortana using the dbareports dataset and returning a Cortana PowerBi page.

item.title: PSConfAsia 2016
item.description:
I have just got back to the UK from Singapore following the amazing PSConfAsia conference. I must say that Matt, Milton, Sebastian and Ben did a fantastic job organising this conference and were proud that there was aÂ notable increase in attendees from last year.

Â 

The conference began (unofficially) with a PowerShell User group session in the Microsoft Offices on Wednesday where Ravi Chaganti spoke about DSC
